text: Aditi Rathore is an Indian television actress who works in Hindi-language soap operas. She is best known for her role of Avni Ayesha in Star Plus' show Naamkarann. == Career == Rathore made her debut in Zee TV's Kumkum Bhagya as Rachna Mehra, wife of Akash Ajay Mehra. She then played the character of Preeti pushkar Malhotra in the soap opera Ek Duje Ki Vaaste, aired mainly on the channel Sony TV. From 2017 to 2018, Rathore played the lead role of Avni Ayesha/Avni Neil Khanna in the Star Plus daily soap opera Naamkarann. She entered the show after a 15-year leap, replacing Arsheen Naamdaar. ==Television== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- |- style="text-align:center;" ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Year ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" |Show ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Role !style="background:#B0C4DE;" |Channel !style="background:#B0C4DE;" |Notes |- |2014-2016 |scope="row"| Kumkum Bhagya | Rachna Srivastav | Zee TV |Supporting Role |- | 2016 |scope="row"| Ek Duje Ke Vaaste | Preeti Tiwari |Sony TV |Parallel lead role |- |2017-2018 |scope="row"| Naamkarann | Avni Ayesha |Star Plus |Lead role |} ==Media== Aditi Rathore was ranked 23rd in Eastern Eyes Sexiest Asian women List 2018 and 12th in Biz Asia's TV Personality List 2018. ==Awards and nominations== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Award !Category !Show !Result !Reference |- |2017 |Indian Television Academy Awards |Best Actress Popular |Naamkarann | | |- |2018 |Indian Television Academy Awards |Best Actress Popular |Naamkarann | | |- |2019 |Face of the Year Awards (Vietnam) |Favorite Foreign TV Actress |Naamkarann | | |} == See also == *List of Indian television actresses *List of Hindi television actresses ==References== == External links== * Category:Living people Category:21st-century Indian actresses Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Aditi Rathore
